attributes.action: stop the growth of under cover council workers to catch minor offences such dropping litter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has got to the point where council employ plain clothes workers who instead of giving a warning and asking you to pick up the litter in the future just give a fine straight away. However, when it comes to tackling a group of rowdy youths they are less enthusiastic. It is easier to pick on soft targets such as mums taking their young children to the park.

rejection.details: Please review the wording of your title.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
